nodes.text: Dinar was a settlement on the planet of Lothal. A few years before the Battle of Yavin, a rogue Imperial named Jovan stopped in Dinar to find a discreet way off Lothal and escape his pursuer, Agent Kallus of the Imperial Security Bureau. At the time of that event, the population of Dinar was comprised of humans and at least one Gotal. A number of Loth-cats roamed on the edges of the city.
